namespaces.description: Map of XML namespaces to URIs

faultJSONPaths.description: List of JSON paths that specify the JSON elements to be filtered from JSON payloads in error flows

faultXPaths.description: List of XPaths that specify the XML elements to be filtered from XML payloads in error flows

requestJSONPaths.description: List of JSON paths that specify the JSON elements to be filtered from JSON request message payloads

requestXPaths.description: List of XPaths that specify the XML elements to be filtered from XML request message payloads

responseJSONPaths.description: List of JSON paths that specify the JSON elements to be filtered from JSON response message payloads

responseXPaths.description: List of XPaths that specify the XML elements to be filtered from XML response message payloads

variables.description: List of variables that should be masked from the debug output
